attributes.action: decriminalise the personal possession of small amounts cannabis
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Cannabis is a popular recreational drug around the world, only behind alcohol, caffeine and tobacco. In the United States alone, it is believed that over 100 million Americans have tried Cannabis. If cannabis was openly available in small quantity's through a government department which could Tax the sale at 100% The money raised could be used to treat people addicted to more serious substances including Alcohol, Cigarettes, Cocaine, Heroin, ect. People who have smoked cannabis include:

Barack Obama
Bill Clinton
John F Kennedy
Bob Dylan 
Neil Young
Art Garfunkel
Bob Marley
Lewis Carroll
Pablo Picasso
Oscar Wilde
Salvador Dali
Sir Paul McCartney
Sir Mick Jagger
Arnold Schwarzenegger
Whoopie Goldberg

+ Too many more to name

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
